article_title: College Football Playoff Committee Gets It Right With Ohio State

article_metadata.description: Alabama, Oregon, Florida State and Ohio State will take part in the first College Football Playoff. Here we give you the logic behind the committee choosing Ohio State over TCU and Baylor.
article_metadata.author: Vincent Frank

og.description: Alabama, Oregon, Florida State and Ohio State will take part in the first College Football Playoff. Here we give you the logic behind the committee choosing Ohio State over TCU and Baylor.
